RESTORATION_INSTANCE.Name: STRING: Optional ResourceName of resource to restore - if blank, all resources of the feature will be restored.
RESTORATION_INSTANCE.Method: STRING: Fixed, Rolled, Chance, UpTo, Attribute, Proficiency, or Full
RESTORATION_INSTANCE.Bonus: NUMBER: For Rolled, Chance, Attribute, or Proficiency
RESTORATION_INSTANCE.Target: NUMBER: For Chance, number that must be rolled to restore

RESTORATION_INSTANCE.NOTE:: Can just be an object instead of an array of objects if only one type of restoration is needed for that instance (most cases)

RESOURCE_NAME.Name: STRING: ResourceName (same as parent key)
RESOURCE_NAME.Base: NUMBER: Base amount restored - OPTIONAL, not set if relies entirely on calculations
RESOURCE_NAME.Minimum: NUMBER: Optional minimum amount of resource you can have (for calculated ones)

Attribute.Attribute: STRING or OBJECT: Attribute modifier used to calculate, PrimeStat to use chosen primary stat for feature; OBJECT if there are multiple options for attribute to be selected (NOTE: This structure doesn't exist - it's for calculating PrimeStat. May be good to actually have for resources though).

Attribute_OBJECT_METHOD.EvalMethod: STRING: max, min, or choose - method of choosing among stats in Stats key.

Attribute.ModifierAmount: NUMBER: Amount to do the above with

Level.ModifierAmount: NUMBER: Amount to do the above with

ScalingLevels.Level: NUMBER: Level at which 'Amount' is used for resource amount
ScalingLevels.Amount: NUMBER: Amount of resource at corresponding level

ClassLevel.ModifierAmount: NUMBER: Amount to do the above with

ScalingLevels.Level: NUMBER: Class level at which 'Amount' is used for resource amount
ScalingLevels.Amount: NUMBER: Amount of resource at corresponding class level

ConditionTier.ModifierAmount: NUMBER: Amount to do the above with

Proficiency.ModifierAmount: NUMBER: Amount to do the above with

SlotLevel.Level: NUMBER: Base level of spell slot
SlotLevel.Scaling: STRING: Add, Multiply, or Divide base by scaling amount
SlotLevel.ScalingAmount: NUMBER: Amount to do the above with

DieSize.Scaling: STRING: Add, Multiply, or Divide base by scaling amount
DieSize.ScalingAmount: NUMBER: Amount to do the above with
